content.rendered: It is hard to resist the first love of your life especially when he is just a few clicks away. This is what happened to Geeti who discovered Siddhartha on Facebook after a gap of 19 years. Both have their own partners and children now; yet the old teenage spark continues over chats, messages, emoticons and things beyond that.
